00112 void getViewVector(TransInfo *t, float coord[3], float vec[3])
00113 {
00114     if (t->persp != RV3D_ORTHO)
00115     {
00116         float p1[4], p2[4];
00117         
00118         copy_v3_v3(p1, coord);
00119         p1[3] = 1.0f;
00120         copy_v3_v3(p2, p1);
00121         p2[3] = 1.0f;
00122         mul_m4_v4(t->viewmat, p2);
00123         
00124         p2[0] = 2.0f * p2[0];
00125         p2[1] = 2.0f * p2[1];
00126         p2[2] = 2.0f * p2[2];
00127         
00128         mul_m4_v4(t->viewinv, p2);
00129         
00130         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, p1, p2);
00131     }
00132     else {
00133         copy_v3_v3(vec, t->viewinv[2]);
00134     }
00135     normalize_v3(vec);
00136 }

00140 static void clipMirrorModifier(TransInfo *t, Object *ob)
00141 {
00142     ModifierData *md= ob->modifiers.first;
00143     float tolerance[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00144     int axis = 0;
00145     
00146     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00147         if ((md->type==eModifierType_Mirror) && (md->mode & eModifierMode_Realtime)) {
00148             MirrorModifierData *mmd = (MirrorModifierData*) md;
00149             
00150             if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_CLIPPING) {
00151                 axis = 0;
00152                 if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_AXIS_X) {
00153                     axis |= 1;
00154                     tolerance[0] = mmd->tolerance;
00155                 }
00156                 if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_AXIS_Y) {
00157                     axis |= 2;
00158                     tolerance[1] = mmd->tolerance;
00159                 }
00160                 if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_AXIS_Z) {
00161                     axis |= 4;
00162                     tolerance[2] = mmd->tolerance;
00163                 }
00164                 if (axis) {
00165                     float mtx[4][4], imtx[4][4];
00166                     int i;
00167                     TransData *td = t->data;
00168                     
00169                     if (mmd->mirror_ob) {
00170                         float obinv[4][4];
00171                         
00172                         invert_m4_m4(obinv, mmd->mirror_ob->obmat);
00173                         mult_m4_m4m4(mtx, obinv, ob->obmat);
00174                         invert_m4_m4(imtx, mtx);
00175                     }
00176                     
00177                     for (i = 0 ; i < t->total; i++, td++) {
00178                         int clip;
00179                         float loc[3], iloc[3];
00180                         
00181                         if (td->flag & TD_NOACTION)
00182                             break;
00183                         if (td->loc==NULL)
00184                             break;
00185                         
00186                         if (td->flag & TD_SKIP)
00187                             continue;
00188                         
00189                         copy_v3_v3(loc,  td->loc);
00190                         copy_v3_v3(iloc, td->iloc);
00191                         
00192                         if (mmd->mirror_ob) {
00193                             mul_m4_v3(mtx, loc);
00194                             mul_m4_v3(mtx, iloc);
00195                         }
00196                         
00197                         clip = 0;
00198                         if (axis & 1) {
00199                             if (fabsf(iloc[0])<=tolerance[0] ||
00200                                loc[0]*iloc[0]<0.0f)
00201                             {
00202                                 loc[0]= 0.0f;
00203                                 clip = 1;
00204                             }
00205                         }
00206                         
00207                         if (axis & 2) {
00208                             if (fabs(iloc[1])<=tolerance[1] ||
00209                                loc[1]*iloc[1]<0.0f)
00210                             {
00211                                 loc[1]= 0.0f;
00212                                 clip = 1;
00213                             }
00214                         }
00215                         if (axis & 4) {
00216                             if (fabs(iloc[2])<=tolerance[2] ||
00217                                loc[2]*iloc[2]<0.0f)
00218                             {
00219                                 loc[2]= 0.0f;
00220                                 clip = 1;
00221                             }
00222                         }
00223                         if (clip) {
00224                             if (mmd->mirror_ob) {
00225                                 mul_m4_v3(imtx, loc);
00226                             }
00227                             copy_v3_v3(td->loc, loc);
00228                         }
00229                     }
00230                 }
00231                 
00232             }
00233         }
00234     }
00235 }

00237 /* assumes obedit set to mesh object */
00238 static void editbmesh_apply_to_mirror(TransInfo *t)
00239 {
00240     TransData *td = t->data;
00241     BMVert *eve;
00242     int i;
00243     
00244     for (i = 0 ; i < t->total; i++, td++) {
00245         if (td->flag & TD_NOACTION)
00246             break;
00247         if (td->loc==NULL)
00248             break;
00249         if (td->flag & TD_SKIP)
00250             continue;
00251         
00252         eve = td->extra;
00253         if (eve) {
00254             eve->co[0]= -td->loc[0];
00255             eve->co[1]= td->loc[1];
00256             eve->co[2]= td->loc[2];
00257         }
00258         
00259         if (td->flag & TD_MIRROR_EDGE)
00260         {
00261             td->loc[0] = 0;
00262         }
00263     }
00264 }

00266 /* for the realtime animation recording feature, handle overlapping data */
00267 static void animrecord_check_state (Scene *scene, ID *id, wmTimer *animtimer)
00268 {
00269     ScreenAnimData *sad= (animtimer) ? animtimer->customdata : NULL;
00270     
00271     /* sanity checks */
00272     if (ELEM3(NULL, scene, id, sad))
00273         return;
00274     
00275     /* check if we need a new strip if:
00276      *  - if animtimer is running 
00277      *  - we're not only keying for available channels
00278      *  - the option to add new actions for each round is not enabled
00279      */
00280     if (IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(scene, INSERTAVAIL)==0 && (scene->toolsettings->autokey_flag & ANIMRECORD_FLAG_WITHNLA)) {
00281         /* if playback has just looped around, we need to add a new NLA track+strip to allow a clean pass to occur */
00282         if ((sad) && (sad->flag & ANIMPLAY_FLAG_JUMPED)) {
00283             AnimData *adt= BKE_animdata_from_id(id);
00284             
00285             /* perform push-down manually with some differences 
00286              * NOTE: BKE_nla_action_pushdown() sync warning...
00287              */
00288             if ((adt->action) && !(adt->flag & ADT_NLA_EDIT_ON)) {
00289                 float astart, aend;
00290                 
00291                 /* only push down if action is more than 1-2 frames long */
00292                 calc_action_range(adt->action, &astart, &aend, 1);
00293                 if (aend > astart+2.0f) {
00294                     NlaStrip *strip= add_nlastrip_to_stack(adt, adt->action);
00295                     
00296                     /* clear reference to action now that we've pushed it onto the stack */
00297                     adt->action->id.us--;
00298                     adt->action= NULL;
00299                     
00300                     /* adjust blending + extend so that they will behave correctly */
00301                     strip->extendmode= NLASTRIP_EXTEND_NOTHING;
00302                     strip->flag &= ~(NLASTRIP_FLAG_AUTO_BLENDS|NLASTRIP_FLAG_SELECT|NLASTRIP_FLAG_ACTIVE);
00303                     
00304                     /* also, adjust the AnimData's action extend mode to be on 
00305                      * 'nothing' so that previous result still play 
00306                      */
00307                     adt->act_extendmode= NLASTRIP_EXTEND_NOTHING;
00308                 }
00309             }
00310         }
00311     }
00312 }

00314 static int fcu_test_selected(FCurve *fcu)
00315 {
00316     BezTriple *bezt= fcu->bezt;
00317     unsigned int i;
00318 
00319     if (bezt==NULL) /* ignore baked */
00320         return 0;
00321 
00322     for (i=0; i < fcu->totvert; i++, bezt++) {
00323         if (BEZSELECTED(bezt)) return 1;
00324     }
00325 
00326     return 0;
00327 }

00329 /* helper for recalcData() - for Action Editor transforms */
00330 static void recalcData_actedit(TransInfo *t)
00331 {
00332     Scene *scene= t->scene;
00333     SpaceAction *saction= (SpaceAction *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
00334     
00335     bAnimContext ac= {NULL};
00336     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00337     bAnimListElem *ale;
00338     int filter;
00339     
00340     /* initialize relevant anim-context 'context' data from TransInfo data */
00341         /* NOTE: sync this with the code in ANIM_animdata_get_context() */
00342     ac.scene= t->scene;
00343     ac.obact= OBACT;
00344     ac.sa= t->sa;
00345     ac.ar= t->ar;
00346     ac.sl= (t->sa)? t->sa->spacedata.first : NULL;
00347     ac.spacetype= (t->sa)? t->sa->spacetype : 0;
00348     ac.regiontype= (t->ar)? t->ar->regiontype : 0;
00349     
00350     ANIM_animdata_context_getdata(&ac);
00351     
00352     /* perform flush */
00353     if (ac.datatype == ANIMCONT_GPENCIL) {
00354         /* flush transform values back to actual coordinates */
00355         flushTransGPactionData(t);
00356     }
00357     else {
00358         /* get animdata blocks visible in editor, assuming that these will be the ones where things changed */
00359         filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_ANIMDATA);
00360         ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
00361         
00362         /* just tag these animdata-blocks to recalc, assuming that some data there changed 
00363          * BUT only do this if realtime updates are enabled
00364          */
00365         if ((saction->flag & SACTION_NOREALTIMEUPDATES) == 0) {
00366             for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00367                 /* set refresh tags for objects using this animation */
00368                 ANIM_list_elem_update(t->scene, ale);
00369             }
00370         }
00371         
00372         /* now free temp channels */
00373         BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00374     }
00375 }
00376 /* helper for recalcData() - for Graph Editor transforms */
00377 static void recalcData_graphedit(TransInfo *t)
00378 {
00379     SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
00380     Scene *scene;
00381     
00382     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00383     bAnimContext ac= {NULL};
00384     int filter;
00385     
00386     bAnimListElem *ale;
00387     int dosort = 0;
00388     
00389     
00390     /* initialize relevant anim-context 'context' data from TransInfo data */
00391         /* NOTE: sync this with the code in ANIM_animdata_get_context() */
00392     scene= ac.scene= t->scene;
00393     ac.obact= OBACT;
00394     ac.sa= t->sa;
00395     ac.ar= t->ar;
00396     ac.sl= (t->sa)? t->sa->spacedata.first : NULL;
00397     ac.spacetype= (t->sa)? t->sa->spacetype : 0;
00398     ac.regiontype= (t->ar)? t->ar->regiontype : 0;
00399     
00400     ANIM_animdata_context_getdata(&ac);
00401     
00402     /* do the flush first */
00403     flushTransGraphData(t);
00404     
00405     /* get curves to check if a re-sort is needed */
00406     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE);
00407     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
00408     
00409     /* now test if there is a need to re-sort */
00410     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00411         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
00412         
00413         /* ignore unselected fcurves */
00414         if (!fcu_test_selected(fcu))
00415             continue;
00416         
00417         // fixme: only do this for selected verts...
00418         ANIM_unit_mapping_apply_fcurve(ac.scene, ale->id, ale->key_data, ANIM_UNITCONV_ONLYSEL|ANIM_UNITCONV_SELVERTS|ANIM_UNITCONV_RESTORE);
00419         
00420         
00421         /* watch it: if the time is wrong: do not correct handles yet */
00422         if (test_time_fcurve(fcu))
00423             dosort++;
00424         else
00425             calchandles_fcurve(fcu);
00426         
00427         /* set refresh tags for objects using this animation,
00428          * BUT only if realtime updates are enabled  
00429          */
00430         if ((sipo->flag & SIPO_NOREALTIMEUPDATES) == 0)
00431             ANIM_list_elem_update(t->scene, ale);
00432     }
00433     
00434     /* do resort and other updates? */
00435     if (dosort) remake_graph_transdata(t, &anim_data);
00436     
00437     /* now free temp channels */
00438     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00439 }

00441 /* helper for recalcData() - for NLA Editor transforms */
00442 static void recalcData_nla(TransInfo *t)
00443 {
00444     TransDataNla *tdn= (TransDataNla *)t->customData;
00445     SpaceNla *snla= (SpaceNla *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
00446     Scene *scene= t->scene;
00447     double secf= FPS;
00448     int i;
00449     
00450     /* for each strip we've got, perform some additional validation of the values that got set before
00451      * using RNA to set the value (which does some special operations when setting these values to make
00452      * sure that everything works ok)
00453      */
00454     for (i = 0; i < t->total; i++, tdn++) {
00455         NlaStrip *strip= tdn->strip;
00456         PointerRNA strip_ptr;
00457         short pExceeded, nExceeded, iter;
00458         int delta_y1, delta_y2;
00459         
00460         /* if this tdn has no handles, that means it is just a dummy that should be skipped */
00461         if (tdn->handle == 0)
00462             continue;
00463         
00464         /* set refresh tags for objects using this animation,
00465          * BUT only if realtime updates are enabled  
00466          */
00467         if ((snla->flag & SNLA_NOREALTIMEUPDATES) == 0)
00468             ANIM_id_update(t->scene, tdn->id);
00469         
00470         /* if canceling transform, just write the values without validating, then move on */
00471         if (t->state == TRANS_CANCEL) {
00472             /* clear the values by directly overwriting the originals, but also need to restore
00473              * endpoints of neighboring transition-strips
00474              */
00475             
00476             /* start */
00477             strip->start= tdn->h1[0];
00478             
00479             if ((strip->prev) && (strip->prev->type == NLASTRIP_TYPE_TRANSITION))
00480                 strip->prev->end= tdn->h1[0];
00481             
00482             /* end */
00483             strip->end= tdn->h2[0];
00484             
00485             if ((strip->next) && (strip->next->type == NLASTRIP_TYPE_TRANSITION))
00486                 strip->next->start= tdn->h2[0];
00487             
00488             /* flush transforms to child strips (since this should be a meta) */
00489             BKE_nlameta_flush_transforms(strip);
00490             
00491             /* restore to original track (if needed) */
00492             if (tdn->oldTrack != tdn->nlt) {
00493                 /* just append to end of list for now, since strips get sorted in special_aftertrans_update() */
00494                 BLI_remlink(&tdn->nlt->strips, strip);
00495                 BLI_addtail(&tdn->oldTrack->strips, strip);
00496             }
00497             
00498             continue;
00499         }
00500         
00501         /* firstly, check if the proposed transform locations would overlap with any neighboring strips
00502          * (barring transitions) which are absolute barriers since they are not being moved
00503          *
00504          * this is done as a iterative procedure (done 5 times max for now)
00505          */
00506         for (iter=0; iter < 5; iter++) {
00507             pExceeded= ((strip->prev) && (strip->prev->type != NLASTRIP_TYPE_TRANSITION) && (tdn->h1[0] < strip->prev->end));
00508             nExceeded= ((strip->next) && (strip->next->type != NLASTRIP_TYPE_TRANSITION) && (tdn->h2[0] > strip->next->start));
00509             
00510             if ((pExceeded && nExceeded) || (iter == 4) ) {
00511                 /* both endpoints exceeded (or iteration ping-pong'd meaning that we need a compromise)
00512                  *  - simply crop strip to fit within the bounds of the strips bounding it
00513                  *  - if there were no neighbors, clear the transforms (make it default to the strip's current values)
00514                  */
00515                 if (strip->prev && strip->next) {
00516                     tdn->h1[0]= strip->prev->end;
00517                     tdn->h2[0]= strip->next->start;
00518                 }
00519                 else {
00520                     tdn->h1[0]= strip->start;
00521                     tdn->h2[0]= strip->end;
00522                 }
00523             }
00524             else if (nExceeded) {
00525                 /* move backwards */
00526                 float offset= tdn->h2[0] - strip->next->start;
00527                 
00528                 tdn->h1[0] -= offset;
00529                 tdn->h2[0] -= offset;
00530             }
00531             else if (pExceeded) {
00532                 /* more forwards */
00533                 float offset= strip->prev->end - tdn->h1[0];
00534                 
00535                 tdn->h1[0] += offset;
00536                 tdn->h2[0] += offset;
00537             }
00538             else /* all is fine and well */
00539                 break;
00540         }
00541         
00542         /* handle auto-snapping */
00543         switch (snla->autosnap) {
00544             case SACTSNAP_FRAME: /* snap to nearest frame/time  */
00545                 if (snla->flag & SNLA_DRAWTIME) {
00546                     tdn->h1[0]= (float)( floor((tdn->h1[0]/secf) + 0.5f) * secf );
00547                     tdn->h2[0]= (float)( floor((tdn->h2[0]/secf) + 0.5f) * secf );
00548                 }
00549                 else {
00550                     tdn->h1[0]= (float)( floor(tdn->h1[0]+0.5f) );
00551                     tdn->h2[0]= (float)( floor(tdn->h2[0]+0.5f) );
00552                 }
00553                 break;
00554             
00555             case SACTSNAP_MARKER: /* snap to nearest marker */
00556                 tdn->h1[0]= (float)ED_markers_find_nearest_marker_time(&t->scene->markers, tdn->h1[0]);
00557                 tdn->h2[0]= (float)ED_markers_find_nearest_marker_time(&t->scene->markers, tdn->h2[0]);
00558                 break;
00559         }
00560         
00561         /* use RNA to write the values... */
00562         // TODO: do we need to write in 2 passes to make sure that no truncation goes on?
00563         RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_NlaStrip, strip, &strip_ptr);
00564         
00565         RNA_float_set(&strip_ptr, "frame_start", tdn->h1[0]);
00566         RNA_float_set(&strip_ptr, "frame_end", tdn->h2[0]);
00567         
00568         /* flush transforms to child strips (since this should be a meta) */
00569         BKE_nlameta_flush_transforms(strip);
00570         
00571         
00572         /* now, check if we need to try and move track
00573          *  - we need to calculate both, as only one may have been altered by transform if only 1 handle moved
00574          */
00575         delta_y1= ((int)tdn->h1[1] / NLACHANNEL_STEP(snla) - tdn->trackIndex);
00576         delta_y2= ((int)tdn->h2[1] / NLACHANNEL_STEP(snla) - tdn->trackIndex);
00577         
00578         if (delta_y1 || delta_y2) {
00579             NlaTrack *track;
00580             int delta = (delta_y2) ? delta_y2 : delta_y1;
00581             int n;
00582             
00583             /* move in the requested direction, checking at each layer if there's space for strip to pass through,
00584              * stopping on the last track available or that we're able to fit in
00585              */
00586             if (delta > 0) {
00587                 for (track=tdn->nlt->next, n=0; (track) && (n < delta); track=track->next, n++) {
00588                     /* check if space in this track for the strip */
00589                     if (BKE_nlatrack_has_space(track, strip->start, strip->end)) {
00590                         /* move strip to this track */
00591                         BLI_remlink(&tdn->nlt->strips, strip);
00592                         BKE_nlatrack_add_strip(track, strip);
00593                         
00594                         tdn->nlt= track;
00595                         tdn->trackIndex++;
00596                     }
00597                     else /* can't move any further */
00598                         break;
00599                 }
00600             }
00601             else {
00602                 /* make delta 'positive' before using it, since we now know to go backwards */
00603                 delta= -delta;
00604                 
00605                 for (track=tdn->nlt->prev, n=0; (track) && (n < delta); track=track->prev, n++) {
00606                     /* check if space in this track for the strip */
00607                     if (BKE_nlatrack_has_space(track, strip->start, strip->end)) {
00608                         /* move strip to this track */
00609                         BLI_remlink(&tdn->nlt->strips, strip);
00610                         BKE_nlatrack_add_strip(track, strip);
00611                         
00612                         tdn->nlt= track;
00613                         tdn->trackIndex--;
00614                     }
00615                     else /* can't move any further */
00616                         break;
00617                 }
00618             }
00619         }
00620     }
00621 }
00622 
00623 /* helper for recalcData() - for Image Editor transforms */
00624 static void recalcData_image(TransInfo *t)
00625 {
00626     if (t->obedit && t->obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00627         SpaceImage *sima= t->sa->spacedata.first;
00628         
00629         flushTransUVs(t);
00630         if (sima->flag & SI_LIVE_UNWRAP)
00631             ED_uvedit_live_unwrap_re_solve();
00632         
00633         DAG_id_tag_update(t->obedit->data, 0);
00634     }
00635 }
00636 
00637 /* helper for recalcData() - for Movie Clip transforms */
00638 static void recalcData_clip(TransInfo *t)
00639 {
00640     SpaceClip *sc = t->sa->spacedata.first;
00641     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00642     ListBase *tracksbase = BKE_tracking_get_tracks(&clip->tracking);
00643     MovieTrackingTrack *track;
00644     
00645     flushTransTracking(t);
00646     
00647     track = tracksbase->first;
00648     while (track) {
00649         if (TRACK_VIEW_SELECTED(sc, track) && (track->flag & TRACK_LOCKED)==0) {
00650             if (t->mode == TFM_TRANSLATION) {
00651                 if (TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, TRACK_AREA_PAT))
00652                     BKE_tracking_clamp_track(track, CLAMP_PAT_POS);
00653                 if (TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH))
00654                     BKE_tracking_clamp_track(track, CLAMP_SEARCH_POS);
00655             }
00656             else if (t->mode == TFM_RESIZE) {
00657                 if (TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, TRACK_AREA_PAT))
00658                     BKE_tracking_clamp_track(track, CLAMP_PAT_DIM);
00659                 if (TRACK_AREA_SELECTED(track, TRACK_AREA_SEARCH))
00660                     BKE_tracking_clamp_track(track, CLAMP_SEARCH_DIM);
00661             }
00662         }
00663         
00664         track = track->next;
00665     }
00666     
00667     DAG_id_tag_update(&clip->id, 0);
00668 }
00669 
00670 /* helper for recalcData() - for 3d-view transforms */
00671 static void recalcData_view3d(TransInfo *t)
00672 {
00673     Base *base = t->scene->basact;
00674     
00675     if (t->obedit) {
00676         if (ELEM(t->obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00677             Curve *cu= t->obedit->data;
00678             ListBase *nurbs= curve_editnurbs(cu);
00679             Nurb *nu= nurbs->first;
00680             
00681             if (t->state != TRANS_CANCEL) {
00682                 clipMirrorModifier(t, t->obedit);
00683                 applyProject(t);
00684             }
00685             
00686             DAG_id_tag_update(t->obedit->data, 0);  /* sets recalc flags */
00687                 
00688             if (t->state == TRANS_CANCEL) {
00689                 while (nu) {
00690                     calchandlesNurb(nu); /* Cant do testhandlesNurb here, it messes up the h1 and h2 flags */
00691                     nu= nu->next;
00692                 }
00693             } 
00694             else {
00695                 /* Normal updating */
00696                 while (nu) {
00697                     test2DNurb(nu);
00698                     calchandlesNurb(nu);
00699                     nu= nu->next;
00700                 }
00701             }
00702         }
00703         else if (t->obedit->type==OB_LATTICE) {
00704             Lattice *la= t->obedit->data;
00705             
00706             if (t->state != TRANS_CANCEL) {
00707                 applyProject(t);
00708             }
00709             
00710             DAG_id_tag_update(t->obedit->data, 0);  /* sets recalc flags */
00711             
00712             if (la->editlatt->latt->flag & LT_OUTSIDE) outside_lattice(la->editlatt->latt);
00713         }
00714         else if (t->obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00715             BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(t->obedit);
00716             /* mirror modifier clipping? */
00717             if (t->state != TRANS_CANCEL) {
00718                 /* apply clipping after so we never project past the clip plane [#25423] */
00719                 applyProject(t);
00720                 clipMirrorModifier(t, t->obedit);
00721             }
00722             if ((t->options & CTX_NO_MIRROR) == 0 && (t->flag & T_MIRROR))
00723                 editbmesh_apply_to_mirror(t);
00724                 
00725             DAG_id_tag_update(t->obedit->data, 0);  /* sets recalc flags */
00726             
00727             EDBM_mesh_normals_update(em);
00728             BMEdit_RecalcTessellation(em);
00729         }
00730         else if (t->obedit->type==OB_ARMATURE) { /* no recalc flag, does pose */
00731             bArmature *arm= t->obedit->data;
00732             ListBase *edbo = arm->edbo;
00733             EditBone *ebo;
00734             TransData *td = t->data;
00735             int i;
00736             
00737             if (t->state != TRANS_CANCEL) {
00738                 applyProject(t);
00739             }
00740             
00741             /* Ensure all bones are correctly adjusted */
00742             for (ebo = edbo->first; ebo; ebo = ebo->next) {
00743                 
00744                 if ((ebo->flag & BONE_CONNECTED) && ebo->parent) {
00745                     /* If this bone has a parent tip that has been moved */
00746                     if (ebo->parent->flag & BONE_TIPSEL) {
00747                         copy_v3_v3 (ebo->head, ebo->parent->tail);
00748                         if (t->mode==TFM_BONE_ENVELOPE) ebo->rad_head= ebo->parent->rad_tail;
00749                     }
00750                     /* If this bone has a parent tip that has NOT been moved */
00751                     else {
00752                         copy_v3_v3 (ebo->parent->tail, ebo->head);
00753                         if (t->mode==TFM_BONE_ENVELOPE) ebo->parent->rad_tail= ebo->rad_head;
00754                     }
00755                 }
00756                 
00757                 /* on extrude bones, oldlength==0.0f, so we scale radius of points */
00758                 ebo->length= len_v3v3(ebo->head, ebo->tail);
00759                 if (ebo->oldlength==0.0f) {
00760                     ebo->rad_head= 0.25f*ebo->length;
00761                     ebo->rad_tail= 0.10f*ebo->length;
00762                     ebo->dist= 0.25f*ebo->length;
00763                     if (ebo->parent) {
00764                         if (ebo->rad_head > ebo->parent->rad_tail)
00765                             ebo->rad_head= ebo->parent->rad_tail;
00766                     }
00767                 }
00768                 else if (t->mode!=TFM_BONE_ENVELOPE) {
00769                     /* if bones change length, lets do that for the deform distance as well */
00770                     ebo->dist*= ebo->length/ebo->oldlength;
00771                     ebo->rad_head*= ebo->length/ebo->oldlength;
00772                     ebo->rad_tail*= ebo->length/ebo->oldlength;
00773                     ebo->oldlength= ebo->length;
00774                 }
00775             }
00776             
00777             
00778             if (t->mode != TFM_BONE_ROLL)
00779             {
00780                 /* fix roll */
00781                 for (i = 0; i < t->total; i++, td++)
00782                 {
00783                     if (td->extra)
00784                     {
00785                         float vec[3], up_axis[3];
00786                         float qrot[4];
00787                         
00788                         ebo = td->extra;
00789                         copy_v3_v3(up_axis, td->axismtx[2]);
00790                         
00791                         if (t->mode != TFM_ROTATION)
00792                         {
00793                             sub_v3_v3v3(vec, ebo->tail, ebo->head);
00794                             normalize_v3(vec);
00795                             rotation_between_vecs_to_quat(qrot, td->axismtx[1], vec);
00796                             mul_qt_v3(qrot, up_axis);
00797                         }
00798                         else {
00799                             mul_m3_v3(t->mat, up_axis);
00800                         }
00801                         
00802                         ebo->roll = ED_rollBoneToVector(ebo, up_axis, FALSE);
00803                     }
00804                 }
00805             }
00806             
00807             if (arm->flag & ARM_MIRROR_EDIT)
00808                 transform_armature_mirror_update(t->obedit);
00809             
00810         }
00811         else {
00812             if (t->state != TRANS_CANCEL) {
00813                 applyProject(t);
00814             }
00815             DAG_id_tag_update(t->obedit->data, 0);  /* sets recalc flags */
00816         }
00817     }
00818     else if ( (t->flag & T_POSE) && t->poseobj) {
00819         Object *ob= t->poseobj;
00820         bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00821         
00822         /* if animtimer is running, and the object already has animation data,
00823          * check if the auto-record feature means that we should record 'samples'
00824          * (i.e. uneditable animation values)
00825          *
00826          * context is needed for keying set poll() functions.
00827          */
00828         // TODO: autokeyframe calls need some setting to specify to add samples (FPoints) instead of keyframes?
00829         if ((t->animtimer) && (t->context) && IS_AUTOKEY_ON(t->scene)) {
00830             int targetless_ik= (t->flag & T_AUTOIK); // XXX this currently doesn't work, since flags aren't set yet!
00831             
00832             animrecord_check_state(t->scene, &ob->id, t->animtimer);
00833             autokeyframe_pose_cb_func(t->context, t->scene, (View3D *)t->view, ob, t->mode, targetless_ik);
00834         }
00835         
00836         /* old optimize trick... this enforces to bypass the depgraph */
00837         if (!(arm->flag & ARM_DELAYDEFORM)) {
00838             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);  /* sets recalc flags */
00839         }
00840         else
00841             where_is_pose(t->scene, ob);
00842     }
00843     else if (base && (base->object->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) && PE_get_current(t->scene, base->object)) {
00844         if (t->state != TRANS_CANCEL) {
00845             applyProject(t);
00846         }
00847         flushTransParticles(t);
00848     }
00849     else {
00850         int i;
00851         
00852         if (t->state != TRANS_CANCEL) {
00853             applyProject(t);
00854         }
00855         
00856         for (i = 0; i < t->total; i++) {
00857             TransData *td = t->data + i;
00858             Object *ob = td->ob;
00859             
00860             if (td->flag & TD_NOACTION)
00861                 break;
00862             
00863             if (td->flag & TD_SKIP)
00864                 continue;
00865             
00866             /* if animtimer is running, and the object already has animation data,
00867              * check if the auto-record feature means that we should record 'samples'
00868              * (i.e. uneditable animation values)
00869              */
00870             // TODO: autokeyframe calls need some setting to specify to add samples (FPoints) instead of keyframes?
00871             if ((t->animtimer) && IS_AUTOKEY_ON(t->scene)) {
00872                 animrecord_check_state(t->scene, &ob->id, t->animtimer);
00873                 autokeyframe_ob_cb_func(t->context, t->scene, (View3D *)t->view, ob, t->mode);
00874             }
00875             
00876             /* sets recalc flags fully, instead of flushing existing ones 
00877              * otherwise proxies don't function correctly
00878              */
00879             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00880         }
00881     }
00882 }
00883 
00884 /* called for updating while transform acts, once per redraw */
00885 void recalcData(TransInfo *t)
00886 {
00887     if (t->spacetype==SPACE_NODE) {
00888         flushTransNodes(t);
00889     }
00890     else if (t->spacetype==SPACE_SEQ) {
00891         flushTransSeq(t);
00892     }
00893     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION) {
00894         recalcData_actedit(t);
00895     }
00896     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_IPO) {
00897         recalcData_graphedit(t);
00898     }
00899     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_NLA) {
00900         recalcData_nla(t);
00901     }
00902     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_IMAGE) {
00903         recalcData_image(t);
00904     }
00905     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D) {
00906         recalcData_view3d(t);
00907     }
00908     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_CLIP) {
00909         recalcData_clip(t);
00910     }
00911 }
00912 
00913 void drawLine(TransInfo *t, float *center, float *dir, char axis, short options)
00914 {
00915     float v1[3], v2[3], v3[3];
00916     unsigned char col[3], col2[3];
00917 
00918     if (t->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D)
00919     {
00920         View3D *v3d = t->view;
00921         
00922         glPushMatrix();
00923         
00924         //if (t->obedit) glLoadMatrixf(t->obedit->obmat);   // sets opengl viewing
00925         
00926         
00927         copy_v3_v3(v3, dir);
00928         mul_v3_fl(v3, v3d->far);
00929         
00930         sub_v3_v3v3(v2, center, v3);
00931         add_v3_v3v3(v1, center, v3);
00932         
00933         if (options & DRAWLIGHT) {
00934             col[0] = col[1] = col[2] = 220;
00935         }
00936         else {
00937             UI_GetThemeColor3ubv(TH_GRID, col);
00938         }
00939         UI_make_axis_color(col, col2, axis);
00940         glColor3ubv(col2);
00941         
00942         setlinestyle(0);
00943         glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00944             glVertex3fv(v1);
00945             glVertex3fv(v2);
00946         glEnd();
00947         
00948         glPopMatrix();
00949     }
00950 }
00951 
00952 void resetTransRestrictions(TransInfo *t)
00953 {
00954     t->flag &= ~T_ALL_RESTRICTIONS;
00955 }
00956 
00957 /* the *op can be NULL */
00958 int initTransInfo (bContext *C, TransInfo *t, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00959 {
00960     Scene *sce = CTX_data_scene(C);
00961     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
00962     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00963     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00964     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00965     
00966     /* moving: is shown in drawobject() (transform color) */
00967 //  TRANSFORM_FIX_ME
00968 //  if (obedit || (t->flag & T_POSE) ) G.moving= G_TRANSFORM_EDIT;
00969 //  else if (G.f & G_PARTICLEEDIT) G.moving= G_TRANSFORM_PARTICLE;
00970 //  else G.moving= G_TRANSFORM_OBJ;
00971     
00972     t->scene = sce;
00973     t->sa = sa;
00974     t->ar = ar;
00975     t->obedit = obedit;
00976     t->settings = ts;
00977     
00978     t->data = NULL;
00979     t->ext = NULL;
00980     
00981     t->helpline = HLP_NONE;
00982     
00983     t->flag = 0;
00984     
00985     t->redraw = 1; /* redraw first time */
00986     
00987     if (event)
00988     {
00989         copy_v2_v2_int(t->imval, event->mval);
00990         t->event_type = event->type;
00991     }
00992     else {
00993         t->imval[0] = 0;
00994         t->imval[1] = 0;
00995     }
00996     
00997     t->con.imval[0] = t->imval[0];
00998     t->con.imval[1] = t->imval[1];
00999     
01000     t->mval[0] = t->imval[0];
01001     t->mval[1] = t->imval[1];
01002     
01003     t->transform        = NULL;
01004     t->handleEvent      = NULL;
01005     
01006     t->total            = 0;
01007     
01008     t->val = 0.0f;
01009     
01010     t->vec[0]           =
01011         t->vec[1]       =
01012         t->vec[2]       = 0.0f;
01013     
01014     t->center[0]        =
01015         t->center[1]    =
01016         t->center[2]    = 0.0f;
01017     
01018     unit_m3(t->mat);
01019     
01020     /* if there's an event, we're modal */
01021     if (event) {
01022         t->flag |= T_MODAL;
01023     }
01024 
01025     /* Crease needs edge flag */
01026     if (t->mode == TFM_CREASE) {
01027         t->options |= CTX_EDGE;
01028     }
01029 
01030 
01031     /* Assign the space type, some exceptions for running in different mode */
01032     if (sa == NULL) {
01033         /* background mode */
01034         t->spacetype= SPACE_EMPTY;
01035     }
01036     else if ((ar == NULL) && (sa->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D)) {
01037         /* running in the text editor */
01038         t->spacetype= SPACE_EMPTY;
01039     }
01040     else {
01041         /* normal operation */
01042         t->spacetype= sa->spacetype;
01043     }
01044 
01045 
01046     if (t->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D)
01047     {
01048         View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
01049         
01050         t->view = v3d;
01051         t->animtimer= CTX_wm_screen(C)->animtimer;
01052         
01053         /* turn manipulator off during transform */
01054         // FIXME: but don't do this when USING the manipulator...
01055         if (t->flag & T_MODAL) {
01056             t->twtype = v3d->twtype;
01057             v3d->twtype = 0;
01058         }
01059 
01060         if (v3d->flag & V3D_ALIGN) t->flag |= T_V3D_ALIGN;
01061         t->around = v3d->around;
01062         
01063         if (op && RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "constraint_orientation") && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "constraint_orientation"))
01064         {
01065             t->current_orientation = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "constraint_orientation");
01066             
01067             if (t->current_orientation >= V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM + BIF_countTransformOrientation(C))
01068             {
01069                 t->current_orientation = V3D_MANIP_GLOBAL;
01070             }
01071         }
01072         else {
01073             t->current_orientation = v3d->twmode;
01074         }
01075 
01076         /* exceptional case */
01077         if (t->around==V3D_LOCAL && (t->settings->selectmode & SCE_SELECT_FACE)) {
01078             if (ELEM3(t->mode, TFM_ROTATION, TFM_RESIZE, TFM_TRACKBALL)) {
01079                 t->options |= CTX_NO_PET;
01080             }
01081         }
01082 
01083         /* initialize UV transform from */
01084         if (op && RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "correct_uv")) {
01085             if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "correct_uv")) {
01086                 if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "correct_uv")) {
01087                     t->settings->uvcalc_flag |= UVCALC_TRANSFORM_CORRECT;
01088                 }
01089                 else {
01090                     t->settings->uvcalc_flag &= ~UVCALC_TRANSFORM_CORRECT;
01091                 }
01092             }
01093             else {
01094                 RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "correct_uv", t->settings->uvcalc_flag & UVCALC_TRANSFORM_CORRECT);
01095             }
01096         }
01097 
01098     }
01099     else if (t->spacetype==SPACE_IMAGE) {
01100         SpaceImage *sima = sa->spacedata.first;
01101         // XXX for now, get View2D from the active region
01102         t->view = &ar->v2d;
01103         t->around = sima->around;
01104     }
01105     else if (t->spacetype==SPACE_NODE) {
01106         // XXX for now, get View2D from the active region
01107         t->view = &ar->v2d;
01108         t->around = V3D_CENTER;
01109     }
01110     else if (t->spacetype==SPACE_IPO) {
01111         SpaceIpo *sipo= sa->spacedata.first;
01112         t->view = &ar->v2d;
01113         t->around = sipo->around;
01114     }
01115     else {
01116         if (ar) {
01117             // XXX for now, get View2D  from the active region
01118             t->view = &ar->v2d;
01119             // XXX for now, the center point is the midpoint of the data
01120         }
01121         else {
01122             t->view= NULL;
01123         }
01124         t->around = V3D_CENTER;
01125     }
01126     
01127     if (op && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "release_confirm"))
01128     {
01129         if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "release_confirm"))
01130         {
01131             t->flag |= T_RELEASE_CONFIRM;
01132         }
01133     }
01134     else {
01135         if (U.flag & USER_RELEASECONFIRM) {
01136             t->flag |= T_RELEASE_CONFIRM;
01137         }
01138     }
01139 
01140     if (op && RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "mirror") && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "mirror"))
01141     {
01142         if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "mirror"))
01143         {
01144             t->flag |= T_MIRROR;
01145             t->mirror = 1;
01146         }
01147     }
01148     // Need stuff to take it from edit mesh or whatnot here
01149     else if (t->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D) {
01150         if (t->obedit && t->obedit->type == OB_MESH && (((Mesh *)t->obedit->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_MIRROR_X))
01151         {
01152             t->flag |= T_MIRROR;
01153             t->mirror = 1;
01154         }
01155     }
01156     
01157     /* setting PET flag only if property exist in operator. Otherwise, assume it's not supported */
01158     if (op && RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "proportional"))
01159     {
01160         if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "proportional"))
01161         {
01162             switch(RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "proportional"))
01163             {
01164             case PROP_EDIT_CONNECTED:
01165                 t->flag |= T_PROP_CONNECTED;
01166             case PROP_EDIT_ON:
01167                 t->flag |= T_PROP_EDIT;
01168                 break;
01169             }
01170         }
01171         else {
01172             /* use settings from scene only if modal */
01173             if (t->flag & T_MODAL) {
01174                 if ((t->options & CTX_NO_PET) == 0) {
01175                     if (t->obedit && ts->proportional != PROP_EDIT_OFF) {
01176                         t->flag |= T_PROP_EDIT;
01177 
01178                         if (ts->proportional == PROP_EDIT_CONNECTED) {
01179                             t->flag |= T_PROP_CONNECTED;
01180                         }
01181                     }
01182                     else if (t->obedit == NULL && ts->proportional_objects) {
01183                         t->flag |= T_PROP_EDIT;
01184                     }
01185                 }
01186             }
01187         }
01188         
01189         if (op && RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "proportional_size") && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "proportional_size"))
01190         {
01191             t->prop_size = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "proportional_size");
01192         }
01193         else {
01194             t->prop_size = ts->proportional_size;
01195         }
01196         
01197         
01198         /* TRANSFORM_FIX_ME rna restrictions */
01199         if (t->prop_size <= 0.00001f)
01200         {
01201             printf("Proportional size (%f) under 0.00001, reseting to 1!\n", t->prop_size);
01202             t->prop_size = 1.0f;
01203         }
01204         
01205         if (op && RNA_struct_find_property(op->ptr, "proportional_edit_falloff") && RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "proportional_edit_falloff"))
01206         {
01207             t->prop_mode = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "proportional_edit_falloff");
01208         }
01209         else {
01210             t->prop_mode = ts->prop_mode;
01211         }
01212     }
01213     else /* add not pet option to context when not available */
01214     {
01215         t->options |= CTX_NO_PET;
01216     }
01217     
01218     // Mirror is not supported with PET, turn it off.
01219     if (t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT)
01220     {
01221         t->flag &= ~T_MIRROR;
01222     }
01223 
01224     setTransformViewMatrices(t);
01225     initNumInput(&t->num);
01226     
01227     return 1;
01228 }
01229 
01230 /* Here I would suggest only TransInfo related issues, like free data & reset vars. Not redraws */
01231 void postTrans (bContext *C, TransInfo *t)
01232 {
01233     TransData *td;
01234     
01235     if (t->draw_handle_view)
01236         ED_region_draw_cb_exit(t->ar->type, t->draw_handle_view);
01237     if (t->draw_handle_apply)
01238         ED_region_draw_cb_exit(t->ar->type, t->draw_handle_apply);
01239     if (t->draw_handle_pixel)
01240         ED_region_draw_cb_exit(t->ar->type, t->draw_handle_pixel);
01241     if (t->draw_handle_cursor)
01242         WM_paint_cursor_end(CTX_wm_manager(C), t->draw_handle_cursor);
01243 
01244     if (t->customFree) {
01245         /* Can take over freeing t->data and data2d etc... */
01246         t->customFree(t);
01247     }
01248     else if ((t->customData != NULL) && (t->flag & T_FREE_CUSTOMDATA)) {
01249         MEM_freeN(t->customData);
01250     }
01251 
01252     /* postTrans can be called when nothing is selected, so data is NULL already */
01253     if (t->data) {
01254         int a;
01255         
01256         /* free data malloced per trans-data */
01257         for (a=0, td= t->data; a<t->total; a++, td++) {
01258             if (td->flag & TD_BEZTRIPLE) 
01259                 MEM_freeN(td->hdata);
01260         }
01261         MEM_freeN(t->data);
01262     }
01263     
01264     BLI_freelistN(&t->tsnap.points);
01265 
01266     if (t->ext) MEM_freeN(t->ext);
01267     if (t->data2d) {
01268         MEM_freeN(t->data2d);
01269         t->data2d= NULL;
01270     }
01271     
01272     if (t->spacetype==SPACE_IMAGE) {
01273         SpaceImage *sima= t->sa->spacedata.first;
01274         if (sima->flag & SI_LIVE_UNWRAP)
01275             ED_uvedit_live_unwrap_end(t->state == TRANS_CANCEL);
01276     }
01277     else if (t->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D) {
01278         View3D *v3d = t->sa->spacedata.first;
01279         /* restore manipulator */
01280         if (t->flag & T_MODAL) {
01281             v3d->twtype = t->twtype;
01282         }
01283     }
01284     
01285     if (t->mouse.data)
01286     {
01287         MEM_freeN(t->mouse.data);
01288     }
01289 }
01290 
01291 void applyTransObjects(TransInfo *t)
01292 {
01293     TransData *td;
01294     
01295     for (td = t->data; td < t->data + t->total; td++) {
01296         copy_v3_v3(td->iloc, td->loc);
01297         if (td->ext->rot) {
01298             copy_v3_v3(td->ext->irot, td->ext->rot);
01299         }
01300         if (td->ext->size) {
01301             copy_v3_v3(td->ext->isize, td->ext->size);
01302         }
01303     }
01304     recalcData(t);
01305 }
01306 
01307 static void restoreElement(TransData *td)
01308 {
01309     /* TransData for crease has no loc */
01310     if (td->loc) {
01311         copy_v3_v3(td->loc, td->iloc);
01312     }
01313     if (td->val) {
01314         *td->val = td->ival;
01315     }
01316 
01317     if (td->ext && (td->flag&TD_NO_EXT)==0) {
01318         if (td->ext->rot) {
01319             copy_v3_v3(td->ext->rot, td->ext->irot);
01320         }
01321         if (td->ext->rotAngle) {
01322             *td->ext->rotAngle= td->ext->irotAngle;
01323         }
01324         if (td->ext->rotAxis) {
01325             copy_v3_v3(td->ext->rotAxis, td->ext->irotAxis);
01326         }
01327         /* XXX, drotAngle & drotAxis not used yet */
01328         if (td->ext->size) {
01329             copy_v3_v3(td->ext->size, td->ext->isize);
01330         }
01331         if (td->ext->quat) {
01332             copy_qt_qt(td->ext->quat, td->ext->iquat);
01333         }
01334     }
01335     
01336     if (td->flag & TD_BEZTRIPLE) {
01337         *(td->hdata->h1) = td->hdata->ih1;
01338         *(td->hdata->h2) = td->hdata->ih2;
01339     }
01340 }
01341 
01342 void restoreTransObjects(TransInfo *t)
01343 {
01344     TransData *td;
01345     TransData2D *td2d;
01346 
01347     for (td = t->data; td < t->data + t->total; td++) {
01348         restoreElement(td);
01349     }
01350     
01351     for (td2d=t->data2d; t->data2d && td2d < t->data2d + t->total; td2d++) {
01352         if (td2d->h1) {
01353             td2d->h1[0] = td2d->ih1[0];
01354             td2d->h1[1] = td2d->ih1[1];
01355         }
01356         if (td2d->h2) {
01357             td2d->h2[0] = td2d->ih2[0];
01358             td2d->h2[1] = td2d->ih2[1];
01359         }
01360     }
01361 
01362     unit_m3(t->mat);
01363     
01364     recalcData(t);
01365 }
01366 
01367 void calculateCenter2D(TransInfo *t)
01368 {
01369     if (t->flag & (T_EDIT|T_POSE)) {
01370         Object *ob= t->obedit?t->obedit:t->poseobj;
01371         float vec[3];
01372         
01373         copy_v3_v3(vec, t->center);
01374         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, vec);
01375         projectIntView(t, vec, t->center2d);
01376     }
01377     else {
01378         projectIntView(t, t->center, t->center2d);
01379     }
01380 }
01381 
01382 void calculateCenterCursor(TransInfo *t)
01383 {
01384     float *cursor;
01385     
01386     cursor = give_cursor(t->scene, t->view);
01387     copy_v3_v3(t->center, cursor);
01388     
01389     /* If edit or pose mode, move cursor in local space */
01390     if (t->flag & (T_EDIT|T_POSE)) {
01391         Object *ob = t->obedit?t->obedit:t->poseobj;
01392         float mat[3][3], imat[3][3];
01393         
01394         sub_v3_v3v3(t->center, t->center, ob->obmat[3]);
01395         copy_m3_m4(mat, ob->obmat);
01396         invert_m3_m3(imat, mat);
01397         mul_m3_v3(imat, t->center);
01398     }
01399     
01400     calculateCenter2D(t);
01401 }
01402 
01403 void calculateCenterCursor2D(TransInfo *t)
01404 {
01405     float aspx=1.0, aspy=1.0;
01406     float *cursor= NULL;
01407     
01408     if (t->spacetype==SPACE_IMAGE) {
01409         SpaceImage *sima= (SpaceImage *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
01410         /* only space supported right now but may change */
01411         ED_space_image_uv_aspect(sima, &aspx, &aspy);
01412         cursor = sima->cursor;
01413     }
01414     
01415     if (cursor) {
01416         t->center[0] = cursor[0] * aspx;
01417         t->center[1] = cursor[1] * aspy;
01418     }
01419     
01420     calculateCenter2D(t);
01421 }
01422 
01423 static void calculateCenterCursorGraph2D(TransInfo *t)
01424 {
01425     SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)t->sa->spacedata.first;
01426     Scene *scene= t->scene;
01427     
01428     /* cursor is combination of current frame, and graph-editor cursor value */
01429     t->center[0]= (float)(scene->r.cfra);
01430     t->center[1]= sipo->cursorVal;
01431     
01432     calculateCenter2D(t);
01433 }
01434 
01435 void calculateCenterMedian(TransInfo *t)
01436 {
01437     float partial[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01438     int total = 0;
01439     int i;
01440     
01441     for (i = 0; i < t->total; i++) {
01442         if (t->data[i].flag & TD_SELECTED) {
01443             if (!(t->data[i].flag & TD_NOCENTER))
01444             {
01445                 add_v3_v3(partial, t->data[i].center);
01446                 total++;
01447             }
01448         }
01449         else {
01450             /*
01451              * All the selected elements are at the head of the array
01452              * which means we can stop when it finds unselected data
01453              */
01454             break;
01455         }
01456     }
01457     if (i)
01458         mul_v3_fl(partial, 1.0f / total);
01459     copy_v3_v3(t->center, partial);
01460     
01461     calculateCenter2D(t);
01462 }
01463 
01464 void calculateCenterBound(TransInfo *t)
01465 {
01466     float max[3];
01467     float min[3];
01468     int i;
01469     for (i = 0; i < t->total; i++) {
01470         if (i) {
01471             if (t->data[i].flag & TD_SELECTED) {
01472                 if (!(t->data[i].flag & TD_NOCENTER))
01473                     minmax_v3v3_v3(min, max, t->data[i].center);
01474             }
01475             else {
01476                 /*
01477                  * All the selected elements are at the head of the array
01478                  * which means we can stop when it finds unselected data
01479                  */
01480                 break;
01481             }
01482         }
01483         else {
01484             copy_v3_v3(max, t->data[i].center);
01485             copy_v3_v3(min, t->data[i].center);
01486         }
01487     }
01488     add_v3_v3v3(t->center, min, max);
01489     mul_v3_fl(t->center, 0.5);
01490     
01491     calculateCenter2D(t);
01492 }
01493 
01494 void calculateCenter(TransInfo *t)
01495 {
01496     switch(t->around) {
01497     case V3D_CENTER:
01498         calculateCenterBound(t);
01499         break;
01500     case V3D_CENTROID:
01501         calculateCenterMedian(t);
01502         break;
01503     case V3D_CURSOR:
01504         if (t->spacetype==SPACE_IMAGE)
01505             calculateCenterCursor2D(t);
01506         else if (t->spacetype==SPACE_IPO)
01507             calculateCenterCursorGraph2D(t);
01508         else
01509             calculateCenterCursor(t);
01510         break;
01511     case V3D_LOCAL:
01512         /* Individual element center uses median center for helpline and such */
01513         calculateCenterMedian(t);
01514         break;
01515     case V3D_ACTIVE:
01516         {
01517         /* set median, and if if if... do object center */
01518         
01519         /* EDIT MODE ACTIVE EDITMODE ELEMENT */
01520 
01521         if (t->obedit) {
01522             if (t->obedit && t->obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
01523                 BMEditSelection ese;
01524                 BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(t->obedit);
01525 
01526                 if (BM_select_history_active_get(em->bm, &ese)) {
01527                     BM_editselection_center(&ese, t->center);
01528                     calculateCenter2D(t);
01529                     break;
01530                 }
01531             }
01532             else if (ELEM(t->obedit->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
01533                 float center[3];
01534                 Curve *cu= (Curve *)t->obedit->data;
01535 
01536                 if (ED_curve_actSelection(cu, center)) {
01537                     copy_v3_v3(t->center, center);
01538                     calculateCenter2D(t);
01539                     break;
01540                 }
01541             }
01542         } /* END EDIT MODE ACTIVE ELEMENT */
01543 
01544         calculateCenterMedian(t);
01545         if ((t->flag & (T_EDIT|T_POSE))==0)
01546         {
01547             Scene *scene = t->scene;
01548             Object *ob= OBACT;
01549             if (ob) {
01550                 copy_v3_v3(t->center, ob->obmat[3]);
01551                 projectIntView(t, t->center, t->center2d);
01552             }
01553         }
01554         
01555         }
01556     }
01557     
01558     /* setting constraint center */
01559     copy_v3_v3(t->con.center, t->center);
01560     if (t->flag & (T_EDIT|T_POSE)) {
01561         Object *ob= t->obedit?t->obedit:t->poseobj;
01562         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, t->con.center);
01563     }
01564     
01565     /* for panning from cameraview */
01566     if (t->flag & T_OBJECT) {
01567         if (t->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D && t->ar && t->ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
01568             View3D *v3d = t->view;
01569             Scene *scene = t->scene;
01570             RegionView3D *rv3d = t->ar->regiondata;
01571             
01572             if (v3d->camera == OBACT && rv3d->persp==RV3D_CAMOB) {
01573                 float axis[3];
01574                 /* persinv is nasty, use viewinv instead, always right */
01575                 copy_v3_v3(axis, t->viewinv[2]);
01576                 normalize_v3(axis);
01577                 
01578                 /* 6.0 = 6 grid units */
01579                 axis[0]= t->center[0]- 6.0f*axis[0];
01580                 axis[1]= t->center[1]- 6.0f*axis[1];
01581                 axis[2]= t->center[2]- 6.0f*axis[2];
01582                 
01583                 projectIntView(t, axis, t->center2d);
01584                 
01585                 /* rotate only needs correct 2d center, grab needs initgrabz() value */
01586                 if (t->mode==TFM_TRANSLATION)
01587                 {
01588                     copy_v3_v3(t->center, axis);
01589                     copy_v3_v3(t->con.center, t->center);
01590                 }
01591             }
01592         }
01593     }
01594     
01595     if (t->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D) {
01596         /* initgrabz() defines a factor for perspective depth correction, used in window_to_3d_delta() */
01597         if (t->flag & (T_EDIT|T_POSE)) {
01598             Object *ob= t->obedit?t->obedit:t->poseobj;
01599             float vec[3];
01600             
01601             copy_v3_v3(vec, t->center);
01602             mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, vec);
01603             initgrabz(t->ar->regiondata, vec[0], vec[1], vec[2]);
01604         }
01605         else {
01606             initgrabz(t->ar->regiondata, t->center[0], t->center[1], t->center[2]);
01607         }
01608     }
01609 }
01610 
01611 void calculatePropRatio(TransInfo *t)
01612 {
01613     TransData *td = t->data;
01614     int i;
01615     float dist;
01616     short connected = t->flag & T_PROP_CONNECTED;
01617 
01618     if (t->flag & T_PROP_EDIT) {
01619         for (i = 0 ; i < t->total; i++, td++) {
01620             if (td->flag & TD_SELECTED) {
01621                 td->factor = 1.0f;
01622             }
01623             else if (t->flag & T_MIRROR && td->loc[0] * t->mirror < -0.00001f) {
01624                 td->flag |= TD_SKIP;
01625                 td->factor = 0.0f;
01626                 restoreElement(td);
01627             }
01628             else if ((connected &&
01629                         (td->flag & TD_NOTCONNECTED || td->dist > t->prop_size))
01630                 ||
01631                     (connected == 0 &&
01632                         td->rdist > t->prop_size))
01633             {
01634                 /*
01635                  * The elements are sorted according to their dist member in the array,
01636                  * that means we can stop when it finds one element outside of the propsize.
01637                  */
01638                 td->flag |= TD_NOACTION;
01639                 td->factor = 0.0f;
01640                 restoreElement(td);
01641             }
01642             else {
01643                 /* Use rdist for falloff calculations, it is the real distance */
01644                 td->flag &= ~TD_NOACTION;
01645                 
01646                 if (connected)
01647                     dist= (t->prop_size-td->dist)/t->prop_size;
01648                 else
01649                     dist= (t->prop_size-td->rdist)/t->prop_size;
01650 
01651                 /*
01652                  * Clamp to positive numbers.
01653                  * Certain corner cases with connectivity and individual centers
01654                  * can give values of rdist larger than propsize.
01655                  */
01656                 if (dist < 0.0f)
01657                     dist = 0.0f;
01658                 
01659                 switch(t->prop_mode) {
01660                 case PROP_SHARP:
01661                     td->factor= dist*dist;
01662                     break;
01663                 case PROP_SMOOTH:
01664                     td->factor= 3.0f*dist*dist - 2.0f*dist*dist*dist;
01665                     break;
01666                 case PROP_ROOT:
01667                     td->factor = (float)sqrt(dist);
01668                     break;
01669                 case PROP_LIN:
01670                     td->factor = dist;
01671                     break;
01672                 case PROP_CONST:
01673                     td->factor = 1.0f;
01674                     break;
01675                 case PROP_SPHERE:
01676                     td->factor = (float)sqrt(2*dist - dist * dist);
01677                     break;
01678                 case PROP_RANDOM:
01679                     BLI_srand( BLI_rand() ); /* random seed */
01680                     td->factor = BLI_frand()*dist;
01681                     break;
01682                 default:
01683                     td->factor = 1;
01684                 }
01685             }
01686         }
01687         switch(t->prop_mode) {
01688         case PROP_SHARP:
01689             strcpy(t->proptext, "(Sharp)");
01690             break;
01691         case PROP_SMOOTH:
01692             strcpy(t->proptext, "(Smooth)");
01693             break;
01694         case PROP_ROOT:
01695             strcpy(t->proptext, "(Root)");
01696             break;
01697         case PROP_LIN:
01698             strcpy(t->proptext, "(Linear)");
01699             break;
01700         case PROP_CONST:
01701             strcpy(t->proptext, "(Constant)");
01702             break;
01703         case PROP_SPHERE:
01704             strcpy(t->proptext, "(Sphere)");
01705             break;
01706         case PROP_RANDOM:
01707             strcpy(t->proptext, "(Random)");
01708             break;
01709         default:
01710             t->proptext[0]= '\0';
01711         }
01712     }
01713     else {
01714         for (i = 0 ; i < t->total; i++, td++) {
01715             td->factor = 1.0;
01716         }
01717         t->proptext[0]= '\0';
01718     }
01719 }
